web-003.title: Sentiment Analysis
web-003.shortDesc: This is a sentiment analysis webpage where you can enter a product name, and the program will fetch its reviews. It then provides a rating indicating whether you should buy it or not, along with the total number of ratings and top review comments.
images: A sleek and modern-looking page designed for a smooth user experience.
web-003.desc: This is a sentiment analysis webpage designed to help users make informed purchasing decisions. By entering the name of a product, the program automatically retrieves its reviews from various sources. It then analyzes these reviews and provides a rating that indicates whether the product is worth buying or not. Additionally, the webpage displays the total number of ratings the product has received, giving users an idea of its popularity. To further assist in decision-making, the program also showcases the top review comments, highlighting key feedback from other buyers.

flu-000.title: WhatsApp
flu-000.shortDesc: This Android app is a WhatsApp clone built with Flutter and Firebase, allowing messaging and calls. It includes chat options, a settings page for customization, multiple themes, and background chat notifications.

flu-000.desc: This Android app is a WhatsApp clone developed using Flutter and Firebase, enabling users to send messages and make calls seamlessly. It offers a full chat experience with various customization options through the settings page. Users can personalize their experience with multiple theme choices and manage their preferences easily. Additionally, the app supports background chat notifications, ensuring users stay updated on new messages even when the app is not actively open.

flu-001.title: YouTube
flu-001.shortDesc: This YouTube clone, built with Flutter and the YouTube API, offers ad-free video playback, local data storage with Hive, channel subscriptions, history tracking, live search suggestions, and video commenting for easy access.
images: A sleek and modern-looking page designed for a smooth user experience.

flu-001.desc: This YouTube clone, developed using Flutter and the Flutter YouTube API, provides an ad-free video streaming experience. It utilizes Hive for local data storage, allowing users to manage their subscriptions, track watch history, and organize playlists. The app features live search suggestions for quick video discovery and enables users to comment on videos, making it easier to revisit them later. With a smooth and user-friendly interface, it enhances the overall video-watching experience while offering greater control over content management.

web-000.title: Productive Start Page
web-000.shortDesc: Developed a customizable browser home page with a to-do manager, productivity settings, and real-time weather updates via OpenWeatherMap for 200,000+ cities.
images: A sleek and modern-looking page designed for a smooth and responsive browser experience.
A modern browser page with multiple clock options, including a stylish analog clock and a precise digital display for a customizable timekeeping experience.
Built-in support for your bookmarks, making it easy to find, organize, and manage them efficiently.
An integrated weather report providing real-time updates for a convenient and informed browsing experience.
A settings tab to personalize and customize the page according to your preferences.
A to-do tab that helps you manage your tasks efficiently and stay organized.
A redesigned context menu with a fresh look for an improved and seamless user experience.
web-000.desc: A visually enhanced and customizable home page for the browser’s tab, integrating features like a to-do list manager, settings to improve user productivity and enhance the browsing experience. • Implemented real-time weather updates using the OpenWeatherMap API covering over 200,000+ cities, allowing users to stay informed while efficiently managing tasks.

py-002.title: Restaurant Management
py-002.shortDesc: THIS WAS MY FIRST EVER PROJECT I HAVE MADE IN & I HAVE MADE IT IN CLASS 11 (2022) ,SO THE APP AND UI MAY LAG AND IS OUTDATED.This restaurant management app, built with Python Tkinter, allows users to browse categorized food items, add them to a cart, manage orders, and proceed with payment. It includes a profile section, a feedback feature, and login/signup options for tracking user data.
py-002.desc: This restaurant management app, developed using Python Tkinter, provides a seamless food ordering experience. Users can browse through a well-organized menu where items are categorized based on their type. They can add selected food items to their cart, review and manage their orders, and proceed with payment. The app also includes a profile section where users can track their order history and manage their personal details. Additionally, a feedback section allows users to share their experiences and suggestions. With login and signup functionality, users can securely store and retrieve their data for a personalized experience.

web-004.title: Split Money
web-004.shortDesc: This is a split app that helps manage expenses when going out with friends. It calculates how much each person needs to pay and provides a detailed transaction list. The app also includes a history tab, easy sign-up options, and features to manage past data and share it with friends.
images: A sleek and modern-looking page designed for a smooth user experience.
web-004.desc: This is a bill-splitting app designed to simplify expense management when going out with friends. It helps calculate how much each person needs to pay, ensuring fair cost distribution. The app provides a detailed transaction list, making it easy to track payments and dues. Additionally, it includes a history tab where users can review past expenses and transactions. With an easy sign-up process, users can quickly create accounts and securely store their data. The app also allows seamless management of older records and provides an option to share expense details with friends for better coordination.

fla-000.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
fla-000.shortDesc: This Tic Tac Toe web app, built with Flask, offers adjustable difficulty levels and 1v1 gameplay. It includes a chat feature, a profile page to track wins and losses, and a notification page to keep users updated.

web-008.title: To-Do (extension)
web-008.shortDesc: This browser extension tracks to-do tasks while you browse, allowing task completion, editing, and theme customization. It also includes lock protection for privacy.
images: A sleek and modern-looking page designed for a smooth user experience. Here Enter your name & password.

web-008.desc: This browser extension helps you manage your to-do tasks while browsing, allowing you to track, edit, and mark tasks as completed. It offers theme customization to match user preferences and includes a lock protection feature to ensure privacy and secure your task list.
future: Cloud Sync – Sync tasks across multiple devices.

py-005.title: Quizzer
py-005.shortDesc: This quiz app, built with Python Tkinter, features 11 default questions. Background music plays throughout, with a success sound for correct answers. However, a wrong answer resets the game to question 0. After completing the quiz, users can rate their experience.
py-005.desc: This quiz app, developed using Python Tkinter, provides an engaging experience with 11 default questions that users must answer. Background music enhances the atmosphere, and a special sound effect plays for every correct response. However, if a user answers incorrectly, the game resets to the first question, adding a challenge to the gameplay. Once the quiz is completed, players have the option to rate their experience, making it interactive and feedback-driven. The combination of music, sound effects, and a reset feature makes the quiz both fun and competitive.
bugs: Music keeps refreshing on every right answer.

web-020.desc: This is an interactive solar system visualization that provides a detailed view of celestial bodies, including planets, the Sun, and asteroids. Users can hover their mouse over each object to reveal informative details, making it an engaging and educational experience. The visual representation helps users understand the relative positions and characteristics of different celestial bodies in a simple and interactive manner.
